titles.title: CB 152 Spirit of the Living God

properties.copyright: Â© 1935. Renewed 1963 Birdwing Music (EMI Christian Music Publishing)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
SPIRIT OF THE LIVING GOD,
Fall afresh on me. Spirit of the living God, fall
afresh on me. Break me, melt me, mold me, fill
me. Spirit of the living God, fall afresh on me.
